"Joy is the business of Heaven." - C. S. Lewis

1 Corinthians 2:9

What we will be like

1 John 3:2

  1. We will no longer sin.

    Philippians 1:6

  2. We will not be subject to the same laws of physics.

    John 20:19, 26

  3. We will still eat and touch.

    John 20:27

    Revelation 22:2

  4. We will never be sick again.

    Revelation 22:3, 21:4

    Isaiah 35:5-6

  5. We will recognize each other.

    Matthew 17:3

  6. We will have deeper relationships.

    Matthew 22:30

What heaven will be like

Revelation 21

  1. We will live in a new Jerusalem.

    Revelation 21

  2. We will be with Christ.

    Revelation 22:4, 14

Revelation 22:14-15, 22:17
